text: The body of a woman was recovered from the Tamirabharani on Friday. Police said that the body was found with a stone tied to the waist with a towel. Police investigation revealed that the body was that of P. Bhuvaneshwari (35) of Thiyagarajanagar, who is suspected to have committed suicide by jumping into the river. Bhuvaneshwari, who was working as an assistant in a bank at Sivanthipatti, was depressed for the past few months. She left the house on Thursday after telling her husband Paramasivan that she was going to her mother’s house in Tirunelveli Town.
title: Woman’s body found
